text: (tavada ovunta) “niyata vasayenma allah meya tahanam kara tibune yayi oba sthira kirimata obage saksin kændavagena enu” yayi oba pavasanu. (ese ovunva kændavagena vit) ovunda (e andamatama boru) saksi pævasuva vuvada, (e venuven) obat ovun samaga ekatu vi (ese) nopævasiya yutuya. tavada apage ayavan boru yayi kiyannange kæmætta oba anugamanaya nokaranu. kavurun avasana dinaya visvasa nokalehuda, ovunma tamange deviyanta (bohomayak devivarunva) samanayan karannaha
